name: A Kraken Adventure
description:
A simple game made for the 2017 Global Gamejam, art assests are made purely out of construction paper. They were cut and scanned by the art team - mechanics are kept simple because we wanted to show off this art style in a game jam setting.

Made in conjuction with

Emelie Edholm(Designer/Publisher) - emelie.edholm@gmail.com

Michael Daltrey(Programmer) - steve4porridge@btinternet.com

Thomas Fyfe(Artist) - thomas@blobstudios.com

Cat Forsyth(Artist)
